Package: ch.codebulb.saveactiongroovyscripts.model

[Groovy] Class CodeFile

    • ch.codebulb.saveactiongroovyscripts.model.CodeFile

    • A wrapper for com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile providing a simplified file access API.

      • Constructor Summary

          Constructors 
          Constructor and description
          CodeFile (com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile virtualFile)

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          CodeFile findOrCreateChild(java.lang.String name)
          Gets the child file, if it exists, or creates an empty file and returns the newly created file otherwise.
          CodeFile[] getChildren()
          Gets the file's child files.
          CodeFile getParent()
          Gets the file's parent folder.
          java.lang.String getText()
          Gets the file content as text
          CodeFile propertyMissing(java.lang.String name)
          Implements the functionality to navigate through a file hierarchy tree with property access, e.g. with this.subfolder.subsubfolder."
          CodeFile propertyMissing(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)
          Implements the functionality to navigate through a file hierarchy tree with property access, and invoking setText(String) and save() on the child file, e.g. with this.subfolder.subsubfolder."
          void save()
          Synchronizes changes with setText(String) to the file system.
          void setText(java.lang.String text)

      • Constructor Detail

        • CodeFile(com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile virtualFile)

      • Method Detail

        • CodeFile findOrCreateChild(java.lang.String name)

          Gets the child file, if it exists, or creates an empty file and returns the newly created file otherwise.

          Returns:
          the child file
          Parameters:
          name - the child file's name

        • CodeFile[] getChildren()

          Gets the file's child files. Returns an empty CodeFile array if the file itself is not a folder

          Returns:
          the child files

        • CodeFile getParent()

          Gets the file's parent folder.

          Returns:
          the parent folder

        • java.lang.String getText()

          Gets the file content as text

          Returns:
          the file content

        • CodeFile propertyMissing(java.lang.String name)

          Implements the functionality to navigate through a file hierarchy tree with property access, e.g. with this.subfolder.subsubfolder."file.java".

          Returns:
          the child file
          Parameters:
          the - child file name

        • CodeFile propertyMissing(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)

          Implements the functionality to navigate through a file hierarchy tree with property access, and invoking setText(String) and save() on the child file, e.g. with this.subfolder.subsubfolder."file.java".

          Returns:
          the child file
          Parameters:
          the - child file name

        • void save()

          Synchronizes changes with setText(String) to the file system. If the file is opened in an IDE editor window, the window content is automatically updated.

        • void setText(java.lang.String text)
